ygData.subject: RE: Charisma and Dexterity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The two of them had held it on their own the night before, I was just icing on the camp.  If you (speaking to the list) find a nice necro who knows their
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 4 Dec 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:

> ok so what happened after? =)
>
> would be VERY surprised and impressed if a 50 druid, 44 necro, and 37 bard
> can do the frenzies.

The two of them had held it on their own the night before, I was just
icing on the camp. If you (speaking to the list) find a nice necro who
knows their class and enjoys grouping, hang on to them with everything you
got. Necros are the most overpowered class in the game when it comes to
damage dealing, and can take down stuff at an insane rate. Their 49 pet
can solo giants and lose maybe half health.

Necros also have hp to mana spells which act over time (like 12hp to
12mana per pulse). That paired with chloro and/or hymn makes for
impressively short downtime for such power.

Not that I'm jealous, my job isn't to inflict damage, and my groupmates
know it well.

Athren

P.s.- Had my first experience last night where someone yelled at me to use
a weapon. It's funny how people don't notice what's going on till they
disturb you, I had 2 of 4 frogs mez'd (this in a pickup group), and was
sitting in the middle of them all taking little to no damage, then the
mage decides to AE nuke and I get beat down to 2 bubbles and everyone
tells me not to stand so close. I was like Grrr.
